summary: This list outlines key challenges in knowledge graph management, focusing on data quality, scalability, integration, reasoning capabilities, and long-term maintenance.
key_points: Quality assurance and validation are critical for ensuring knowledge graph accuracy
Scalability becomes problematic when dealing with very large graph structures
Integration of heterogeneous and conflicting information presents significant challenges
Reasoning over incomplete and uncertain knowledge requires specialized approaches
Ongoing maintenance and evolution strategies are necessary for knowledge graph longevity
